item.title: 50th keyboard - Giveaway
item.description: ** GIVEAWAY IS OVER ** I built my first custom mechanical keyboard 19th of August, 2019. never would I have thought that I’d ever build 50 of them. It’s been crazy and feels unbelievable. The 50th keyboard is going to be a special one. I am giving it away in my Twitch channel! The 50th keyboard I decided to go with a SixtyFive keyboard by Mode Designs. The SixtyFive keyboard (also known as Mode65) is a highly configurable keyboard with a 65% layout.

item.title: LogiMech
item.description: Prologue Logitech Extreme 3D Pro is a legendary joystick/flightstick, however you want to say it. It was released in 2003 and it is still in production and sold for around 50‚Ç¨. You can get these for cheap. The joystick itself is really basic, but gives you a good variety of buttons and features for a small price. Even if the name gives you a small hint, that there might be a casual version of the joystick, but on the contrary, there isn’t.

item.title: Keyboards by Heikki
item.description: Browse my previous commission keyboards and find more information on how you can order a custom keyboard! Vega by ai03 GMMK Pro Mode65 KBD67 rev 2.0 DZ60 Lily58 Pro KBD67 rev 2.0 KBD75v2 ErgoDone PRKL30 XD87 KBD67 rev 2.0 More information on some of these keyboards, check here! Pricing All prices include VAT 24% (ALV). Keyboard build commissions Are you interested in a custom keyboard? Contact me for more information. I can help you with the whole process.

item.title: Keyboard portfolio
